messages.message:
Something is wrong with flow execution on dogfood related to batch size. The flow seems to get stuck after running the first batch. This might be the cause of the current failing golden test. How to reproduce:
1. Open a metaflow binary
2. Select an input folder that has multiple files 
3. Change the batch size to a number smaller than the # of input files 
4. Run flow, flow never finishes. Check the output folder, the number of files processed == batch size
cc @shaunak @abhilash

I created a Jira ticket for this, assigning to you first @shaunak - please help reassign. thanks
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-734
